data.title: 准备以至少30秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: From the picture, five male workers are wearing bright orange work uniforms. One of them is repairing the railway while another one is painting the wall. There is also a dark railway. They are repairing the railway in a tunnel. It looks like they have perfect protection because they are just painting and repairing and they still have their helmets on.
